snippet: To its creators and numerous disciples, bitcoin is a mostly ideological undertaking, more philosophy than finance.
abstract: News analysis; Bitcoin has drawn media attention that may give one the impression that it is the latest Wall Street fetish or a juiced-up version of PayPal, but that notion obscures the fact that it is mostly an ideological undertaking; to its creators and numerous disciples, digital currency's goal is to unleash repressed economies, to take down global banking or to wage a war against the Federal Reserve.
lead_paragraph: To its creators and numerous disciples, bitcoin is a mostly ideological undertaking, more philosophy than finance.
